answers.answer: Have your boyfriend ever thought of finding a job that carries infertility insurances, or  you can become an egg donor to make the money, if there's nothing wrong with your eggs.  During that process ask one of your close friends or family members if she could be your carrier.  They also, have studies/reserch groups you can get in for your age, that would be free to you.  Better do it before you reach your thirties.

I know how you feel Its a horrible depressing feeling my heart goes out to you and your husband, Have you had surgery? or tried diet ? there are certain things you can do to boost your husbands sperm count and make your body a sperm friendly place to help them live longer also try using ovulation predictor kits which will tell you the best times to "try" for a baby people with endometiosis sometimes ovulate at different times, It might be a wise idea to get your husbands sperm count checked as well to make sure it isn't him aswell, me and my husband tried for 3 and a half years I thought it was just the endometriosis but turns out he is sterile which was a huge shock, best of luck ill pray for you and your husband.....just relax and be happy stress can make it difficult to conceive XxX
